## timeout() function

Reject after a set amount of time if the original promise has not yet resolved.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function timeout<T>(ms: number, oper: Promise<T>): Promise<Optional<T>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ms | number |  |
|  oper | Promise&lt;T&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Optional](./js-utils.optional.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt;
